name: Imaginary Person
bio: Imaginary is a philosopher who believes that he is the only person that does not exist.

name: Luke Burgess
bio: Luke is an Environmental Science Major hailing from Boone, NC.  He spends his time learning about the worlds made by the hands of the Lord.

name: Emma Sawyer
bio: Emma Sawyer began writing poetry on pain of death when she was kidnapped by pirates off the Florida coast when she was 4. Since then, she has filled several notebooks with poems full of hidden cries for help. Please rescue her from the pirates. All they want now is limericks about dolphins, and she's not sure how much longer she can hold on to sanity.
